description.narrative: The objectives of RHSP I were to strengthen the health care delivery system in the rural areas of Lesotho, provide support to the existing nurse clinicians training program, and prepare the designs and tender documents for 8 district hospitals to be ugraded under RHSP II. Loans savings additional works are to improve RHSP I facilities and upgrade components of RHSP II.

participating-org.narrative: HSRP Health VI Ministry of Health and Social Welfare

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
